msg: Get ready to defend your server!
You've defeated this gelatonous fiend! Searching through its ship you find alien tech to sell.
You scare off the {name}. It runs back to its ship and takes off but drops its wallet so you take it.
You blow up the {name} and its ship! The president is satisfied and rewards you.
You've failed to fight off the {name} and it shoots its lazer-beam eyes into the server.
You are overrun by the {name} and it shoots at the channel's citizens!
The {name} stands tall and prepares to attack. Quick! It's susceptible to both punches and kicks!
The {name} towers over you but do not falter, this only makes it easier to hit!
The {name} crouches under all your punches
The {name} crouches, avoiding all the punches!
The {name} jumps and almost seems to hover just above your kicking range.
The {name} jumps up high thwarting your attempts to kick it!
